scripts.git:go: git commit -m 'ok' & git checkout master & git merge development-staticsite & git push origin master & git push origin development-staticsite & git checkout development-staticsite
scripts.bundle:dev: parcel index.pug astah/*.* astah/*/*.* astah/*/*/*.* astah/*/*/*/*.*
scripts.bundle:pro: parcel build index.pug astah/*.* astah/*/*.* astah/*/*/*.* astah/*/*/*/*.* -d ../homepage-public --public-url ./
scripts.test: npm run clean:dev & npm run bundle:dev
scripts.build: npm run clean:pro & npm run bundle:pro & npm run cd:pro & npm run ready
